@graph.name: What potatoes are best for mashed potatoes?

acceptedAnswer.text: For creamy mashed potatoes I recommend you use russet or Yukon gold potatoes. They have a higher starch content, which is good because the starch granules swell during the boiling process which creates fluffy mashed potatoes

@graph.name: Why are my mashed potatoes gummy?

acceptedAnswer.text: Mashing the potatoes too much or too vigorously results in gummy potatoes. The best tool to use is a potato ricer, fork, or potato masher.
